Tarun Sachdeva

Feb 10, 2019

The Gumroad Story

I remember hearing about Gumroad and it’s founder Sahil Lavingia when Chris Sacca tweeted about him sometime in 2012. At that time, Gumroad was enjoying it’s time in the limelight and Sahil was the 19-year-old whiz kid entrepreneur.

He’s since gone through an incredible journey and shared it in a lengthy post - it’s chock full of insight into the ups and downs of company building.


About

My name is Tarun Sachdeva. I'm the GM of Tap by Wattpad, a platform for enjoying interactive stories.

I use this space to write everyday - to clarify my thoughts, learn through writing, and sometimes just journal and post things I find interesting.
